ThingDef.label: evolved secondary heart
ThingDef.description: A secondary heart created by accelerated evolution. Grants its host a level of physical redundancy that allows them to survive should their primary heart fail.

ThingDef.label: evolved primary heart
ThingDef.description: A primary heart created by accelerated evolution. Much more efficient and resilitent compared to a regular heart, it consists of a more robust and powerful design.

ThingDef.label: evolved kidney
ThingDef.description: A kidney created by accelerated evolution. Can filter toxic buildup and other impurities out of blood much more efficiently.

ThingDef.label: evolved lung
ThingDef.description: A lung created by accelerated evolution. Capable of cycling more gases in and out of its host than any many augumentic upgrades.

ThingDef.label: evolved third lung
ThingDef.description: An extra lung created by accelerated evolution. Capable of increasing the amount of air cycled through the body, but more importantly, is much more efficient at resisting airborne toxins.

ThingDef.label: evolved stomach
ThingDef.description: A stomach created by accelerated evolution. Capable of breaking down almost anything into usable nutrients, even large chunks of metal.

ThingDef.label: evolved liver
ThingDef.description: A liver created by accelerated evolution. Capable of filtering out large amounts of toxins from the blood, as well as regulating the body more efficiently than a normal liver.

ThingDef.label: evolved eye
ThingDef.description: An eye created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to see in multiple wavelengths of the EM spectrum, as well as having telescopic vision, while also providing extra brain matter to process the information.

ThingDef.label: evolved pinions
ThingDef.description: A set of pinions created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to fly at rapid speeds while carrying a medium weight load. Remarkably durable for their function.

ThingDef.label: evolved combat glands
ThingDef.description: A set of combat glands created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to percieve their enemies movements more effectively in the heat of battle.

ThingDef.label: evolved leg
ThingDef.description: A leg created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to move at a rapid speed, while also supporting much more mass than ever before.

ThingDef.label: evolved nose
ThingDef.description: A nose created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to detect microscopic changes in the chemicals surrounding them, increasing efficiency when working with plants or fauna.

ThingDef.label: evolved larnyx
ThingDef.description: A voice box created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to change their voice to appeal to any person, while also functioning as a form of echolocation in combat, allowing the host to shoot more effectively.

ThingDef.label: evolved ear
ThingDef.description: An ear created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to detect noises far outside the normal hearing range, while also allowing them to detect slight pressure changes in the area.

ThingDef.label: evolved ribcage
ThingDef.description: A ribcage created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to resist much more damage towards the torso, effectively becoming a second layer of armor.

ThingDef.label: evolved skin
ThingDef.description: A carapace created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to ignore light damage to the skin, while also serving as a massive insulant versus any large temperature changes outside the body.

ThingDef.label: evolved spine
ThingDef.description: A spine created by accelerated evolution. Integrated neural clusters allows the host to react more quickly to any circumstance, increasing efficiency.

ThingDef.label: evolved tail
ThingDef.description: A tail created by accelerated evolution. While increasing the host's manipulation ability slightly, its main purpose is the massive blade at the tip.

ThingDef.label: evolved jaw
ThingDef.description: A jaw created by accelerated evolution. Allows the host to devour food at a rapid rate, while also increasing diplomatic skills. Contains retractable fangs.

ThingDef.label: evolved brain
ThingDef.description: A brain created by accelerated evolution. Amplifies the ability to process all information, as well as granting new ways to deal with high amounts of mental stress.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm
ThingDef.description: A normal arm created by accelerated evolution. Much more efficient than a natural arm in all ways, even outstripping bionics.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm claw
ThingDef.description: An arm claw created by accelerated evolution. While worse than an normal arm at manipulation and worse than a bone sabre at combat, lives in a healthy balance between the two.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm sabre
ThingDef.description: An arm sabre created by accelerated evolution. While not great at manpulation, serves as one of the most deadly close combat weapons known to the rim.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm mace
ThingDef.description: An arm mace created by accelerated evolution. While not great at manpulation, serves as one of the most deadly close combat weapons known to the rim.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm tentacle
ThingDef.description: An arm tentacle created by accelerated evolution. Not great at combat, but amazing at manipulating objects due to the wide range of articulation.

ThingDef.label: evolved arm shield
ThingDef.description: An arm shield created by accelerated evolution. Not really usable for anything other than blocking damage, but grants its user a massive boost in defensive capabilities.

ThingDef.label: evolved extra leg cluster
ThingDef.description: An extra leg cluster created by accelerated evolution. Mimicking the extremities of a spider, these extra waist mounted legs allows the host more mobility in the battlefield.
